value:
$WmMPID_ニョルズ,ch00_51_Njord_M_Normal,Face_Normal2|There Heiðr is. Now, Seiðr.$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Please, King Njörðr, there must be
some other way... If only I had more
time to—$k$p$WmMPID_ニョルズ,ch00_51_Njord_M_Normal,Face_Normal2|Seiðr, I know how you must feel,
but surely you can see how much
she suffers...$k$p$WmMEID_ヘイズ敵,ch00_49_Heith_F_Enemy01,Face_Pain|Nyaaaggghhh... S-Seið...$k$pTh-the...serpents...$k$p$EFace_Pain2|I'm...scared... It's too...too...$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Heið...$k$p$WmMPID_ニョルズ,ch00_51_Njord_M_Normal,Face_Pain|The pain must be immense, how
that gold slithers under her skin...$k$pThere is nothing to be done now.
It would be a kindness to end her
life before her mind is fully gone.$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Heið...$k$p$WmMEID_ヘイズ敵,ch00_49_Heith_F_Enemy01,Face_Pain2|...S-Seið!$k$p

$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Heiðr! I'm...sorry...$k$pI thought we could find a way to stop
the curse—some way we could make
it through this together...$k$pAs much as I wanted it to be some
other way, I was still the one forced
to...to...$k$p$WmMEID_ヘイズ敵,ch00_49_Heith_F_Enemy00,Face_Smile|Seið... It's not your fault...$k$pAll I ask is...you remember me...$k$p$EFace_Pain2|Remember...I love you, Seiðr.$k$p$Sbs7000|$EFace_Cry|...$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Heiðr...$k$p$Sbs1000|$EFace_Pain2|*sob*$k$p$SbpBGM_MNS_FE14_14,0|$WmMPID_ニョルズ,ch00_51_Njord_M_Normal,Face|You have played your part
well, Seiðr.$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Pain2|My part? What do you mean,
King Njörðr?$k$p$WmMPID_ニョルズ,ch00_51_Njord_M_Normal,Face_Smile2|The golden serpents that grew
in Heiðr now grow in you.$k$pAll is as I have planned.$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Pain2|Wh-what?$k$pKing Njörðr... What are you saying?!$k$p$WmMPID_ニョルズ,ch00_51_Njord_M_Normal,Face_Cool2|To save your sister, to fight Gullveig,
you fought to return me my Ár.$k$pI granted you the power of my light,
and with it, you struck Heiðr down.$k$p$EFace_Smile2|All this was required to complete
the rite that will make you Gullveig.$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Pain2|You...want to...make me Gullveig?$k$p$WmMPID_ニョルズ,ch00_51_Njord_M_Normal,Face_Smile2|Now, the rite is finished. The serpents
are free to grow within their new
goddess vessel.$k$p$EFace_Cool|And then you, Seiðr, will become
the Golden Seer!$k$p$Fo2000,255,255,255,255|$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Pain|$Fi2000|Gyaaahhh!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Seiðr!$k$p$WmMPID_ニョルズ,ch00_51_Njord_M_Normal,Face_Smile3|Heh heh heh... Good! The serpents
slither with excitement!$k$pDespair as you will, they will only
tighten their grip until they've
swallowed even your hope itself!$k$pAnd then, well... When even despair
loses its meaning, the Golden Seer
will be all that remains! Ah-hahaha!$k$p$Sbs150|
